holidays.name: Polar Bear Plunge Day
holidays.blurb: Find some ice-cold water, jump in it!

holidays.name: Buffet Day
holidays.blurb: Wear your comfy pants.

holidays.name: Science Fiction Day
holidays.blurb: Grok some mind-blowing ideas.

holidays.name: Festival of Sleep Day
holidays.blurb: Stay in bed. Sleep longer.

holidays.name: Trivia Day
holidays.blurb: What is the airspeed of an unladen swallow?

holidays.name: Bird Day
holidays.blurb: No, you cannot fly on this day. Appreciate those who can.

holidays.name: Bean Day
holidays.blurb: They may not all be magic.

holidays.name: Old Rock Day
holidays.blurb: From mountains to pebbles, find time to appreciate our stony friends.

holidays.name: Earth's Rotation Day
holidays.blurb: Some people can feel the earth moving. Can you?

holidays.name: Clean Off Your Desk Day
holidays.blurb: Don't forget to dust as well. Achoo!

holidays.name: Static Electricity Day
holidays.blurb: Can range from pajama sparks to lightning.

holidays.name: Word Nerd Day
holidays.blurb: Pulchritudinous. Onomatopoeia. Aibohphobia.

holidays.name: Cut Your Energy Costs Day
holidays.blurb: Turn off lights you aren't using.

holidays.name: Learn Your Name in Morse Code Day
Marzipan Day
holidays.blurb: For the sophisticated sweet tooth.

holidays.name: Make Your Dreams Come True Day
holidays.blurb: Shoot for the moon!

holidays.name: Organize Your Home Day
holidays.blurb: Beware of closet avalanches.

holidays.name: Strawberry Ice Cream Day
holidays.blurb: Ask for two scoops.

holidays.name: Nothing Day
holidays.blurb: This will blow your mind: nothing is actually something.

holidays.name: Benjamin Franklin Day
holidays.blurb: Founding father. Discoverer of electricity. Ladies man.

holidays.name: Kid Inventors' Day
holidays.blurb: Tiny lab coats optional, but highly recommended.

holidays.name: Ditch New Year's Resolution Day
holidays.blurb: That is, if you've even made it this far.

holidays.name: Thesaurus Day
holidays.blurb: Embrace synonyms.

holidays.name: Tin Can Day
holidays.blurb: Two cans, a little string, and you have a phone.

holidays.name: Popcorn Day
holidays.blurb: Your fellow office workers can't tell you anything today.

holidays.name: Soup Swap Day
holidays.blurb: We all have cans of soup in our pantry we will never eat. Might as well swap them and see.

holidays.name: Penguin Awareness Day
holidays.blurb: The most formally dressed of the animal kingdom.

holidays.name: Squirrel Appreciation Day
holidays.blurb: They're just rats, but the tail changes everything.

holidays.name: Hot Sauce Day
holidays.blurb: There's no such thing as too spicy today.

holidays.name: Handwriting Day
holidays.blurb: Give calligraphy a try.

holidays.name: Compliment Day
holidays.blurb: You are doing a great job reading this description.

holidays.name: Macintosh Computer Day
holidays.blurb: Time for an upgrade.

holidays.name: Opposite Day
holidays.blurb: You go that way, I'll go this way.

holidays.name: Spouse's Day
holidays.blurb: Did you forget your anniversary?

holidays.name: Chocolate Cake Day
holidays.blurb: The best kind of cake.

holidays.name: e-Day
holidays.blurb: When numbers are irrational, things get weird.

holidays.name: Data Privacy Day
holidays.blurb: Check your privacy settings on all your devices and social media.

holidays.name: Puzzle Day
holidays.blurb: Find all the edges first.

holidays.name: Croissant Day
holidays.blurb: Visit your local bakery for buttery flaky goodness.

holidays.name: Backwards Day
holidays.blurb: Walk backwards. Turn your clothes around. Drive in reverse.

holidays.name: Freedom Day
holidays.blurb: Celebrate all the everyday freedoms we take for granted and remember those who struggled to make it so.

holidays.name: Work Naked Day
holidays.blurb: Best for remote workers.

holidays.name: Day of the CrÃªpe
holidays.blurb: CrÃªpe: the better pancake. Find some lingonberries if you can.

holidays.name: Play Your Ukulele Day
holidays.blurb: Time to actually learn how to play that uke in the closet.

holidays.name: Eat Ice Cream for Breakfast Day
holidays.blurb: Seems wrong, but on this day can be oh so right.

holidays.name: Carrot Cake Day
holidays.blurb: The cake we pretend is healthy can actually be delicious.

holidays.name: Thank Your Mailman Day
holidays.blurb: It's not their fault there's so much junk mail.

holidays.name: Stuffed Mushroom Day
holidays.blurb: Stuffed mushrooms are like baked potatoes: only as good as what you pile on top.

holidays.name: Weatherperson's Day
holidays.blurb: For all those times when a weather prediction has saved your plans.

holidays.name: Chocolate Fondue Day
holidays.blurb: Because anything dipped in melted chocolate is awesome.

holidays.name: Chopsticks Day
holidays.blurb: The sign of a well-rounded adult: You hold your chopsticks properly.

holidays.name: Wave All Your Fingers at Your Neighbor Day
holidays.blurb: It might weird them out if you've never done it before, but give it a shot and see if it's reciprocated.

holidays.name: Send a Card to a Friend Day
holidays.blurb: No emails or e-cards allowed!

holidays.name: Laugh and Get Rich Day
holidays.blurb: The second part is much harder than the first, but essentially: do what you enjoy today.

holidays.name: Toothache Day
holidays.blurb: Remember that last toothache? Make an appointment with your dentist today!

holidays.name: Bagel and Lox Day
holidays.blurb: Find your local deli or bagel shop and learn what lox is if you don't know.

holidays.name: Umbrella Day
holidays.blurb: Nothing makes you feel better prepared than to have an umbrella when you need it.

holidays.name: Make a Friend Day
holidays.blurb: Start by learning each other's names. Then find a common interest.

holidays.name: Don't Cry Over Spilled Milk Day
holidays.blurb: Crying won't help clean it up.

holidays.name: Clean Out Your Computer Day
holidays.blurb: When your recycle bin is taking up the most space on your machine.

holidays.name: Darwin Day
holidays.blurb: What seems so obvious now, took Darwin to point it out.

holidays.name: Radio Day
holidays.blurb: WTUL 91.5 is highly recommended.

holidays.name: Ferris Wheel Day
holidays.blurb: When you're stuck at the top remember: you've also got the best view.

holidays.name: Library Lovers Day
holidays.blurb: The friendly, quiet place to learn all there is to know.

holidays.name: Gumdrop Day
holidays.blurb: Grab a bag of gumdrops at your local store or try making at home.

holidays.name: Do a Grouch a Favor Day
holidays.blurb: If lots of people end up doing you favors today...never mind.

holidays.name: Random Act of Kindness Day
holidays.blurb: Anything that makes another living being a little happier.

holidays.name: Battery Day
holidays.blurb: Charge up all those devices.

holidays.name: Chocolate Mint Day
holidays.blurb: Plant a chocolate mint plant for great smells and useful leaves year-round.

holidays.name: Cherry Pie Day
holidays.blurb: It's always the right time for this classic.

holidays.name: Sticky Bun Day
holidays.blurb: Messy fingers are a small price to pay.

holidays.name: Single Tasking Day
holidays.blurb: Set your status to do-not-disturb and get. it. done.

holidays.name: Be Humble Day
holidays.blurb: Sit down. Be humble.

holidays.name: Dog Biscuit Appreciation Day
holidays.blurb: The dog treat that you're kinda curious about.

holidays.name: Tortilla Chip Day
holidays.blurb: Crunchy and munchy.

holidays.name: Sword Swallowers Day
holidays.blurb: Do not try this at home.

holidays.name: Clam Chowder Day
holidays.blurb: Try the many varieties of clam chowder; it's not just New England's.

holidays.name: Pistachio Day
holidays.blurb: When improperly stored in bulk, pistachios can spontaneously combust.

holidays.name: Tell a Fairy Tale Day
holidays.blurb: Once upon a time...

holidays.name: Pancake Day
holidays.blurb: Peanut butter can be a nice alternate topping, but maple syrup is a must.

holidays.name: Public Sleeping Day
holidays.blurb: Recommended places: movie theater, library, coffee shop. Not recommended: building ledges.

holidays.name: Leap Day
holidays.blurb: Once every four years and a reminder our calendar is cuckoo.

holidays.name: Peanut Butter Lovers' Day
holidays.blurb: The most versatile of spreads. Try on carrots, apples, sandwiches and pancakes.

holidays.name: Plan a Solo Vacation Day
holidays.blurb: Treat yourself. Even if you don't actually go anywhere, planning can be therapeutic.

holidays.name: Old Stuff Day
holidays.blurb: Get rid of your old stuff and try something new.

holidays.name: I Want You to be Happy Day
holidays.blurb: Encourage others to stop worrying and be happy.

holidays.name: March Forth and Do Something Day
holidays.blurb: Get scuba certified. Learn a musical instrument. Seize this day.

holidays.name: Learn What Your Name Means Day
holidays.blurb: If it doesn't have one, you could make it up!

holidays.name: Dentistâ€™s Day
holidays.blurb: Show appreciation for your dentist, perhaps the most underappreciated person in your life.

holidays.name: Alexander Graham Bell Day
holidays.blurb: An early phone greeting was 'Ahoy!'

holidays.name: Proofreading Day
holidays.blurb: Double check your emails and texts one more time before you hit sned today.

holidays.name: Panic Day
holidays.blurb: Could go two ways: try extra hard to keep calm or when something entirely trivial happens, FREAK OUT!

holidays.name: Mario Day
holidays.blurb: Everyone's favorite Italian plumber who also happens to save princesses and fight nightmare creatures.

holidays.name: Oatmeal Nut Waffle Day
holidays.blurb: Oddly specific, but sounds delicious.

holidays.name: Napping Day
holidays.blurb: Is there anything better than a midday nap?

holidays.name: Alfred Hitchcock Day
holidays.blurb: Watch films such as Vertigo, Psycho or North By Northwest.

holidays.name: Jewel Day
holidays.blurb: Your day to look like royalty. Could be a good day for a special gift.

holidays.name: Pi Day
holidays.blurb: Mathematical constant beginning with 3.14. Also, an excuse to eat pie.

holidays.name: Everything You Think is Wrong Day
holidays.blurb: Think you might be wrong about something and be open to the other side.

holidays.name: Absolutely Incredible Kid Day
holidays.blurb: Allow yourself to enter into the imaginative world of our younger selves by letting them direct play.

holidays.name: Every Thing You Do is Right Day
holidays.blurb: Imagine you drank some felix felicis.

holidays.name: Submarine Day
holidays.blurb: Other than the nautical vessel, maybe a sandwich would work.

holidays.name: Awkward Moments Day
holidays.blurb: Trap people you see walking into 'are they going left or right' situations.

holidays.name: Let's Laugh Day
holidays.blurb: Tell someone a funny story from your past and hear one in return.

holidays.name: Storytelling Day
holidays.blurb: Campfire not required.

holidays.name: Proposal Day
holidays.blurb: Could this be all you needed to pop the question?

holidays.name: Common Courtesy Day
holidays.blurb: Keep that elevator door open a little longer today.

holidays.name: Goof Off Day
holidays.blurb: Be a kid again.

holidays.name: OK Day
holidays.blurb: Two little letters with a world of meaning.

holidays.name: Puppy Day
holidays.blurb: They may have sharp teeth and ruin everything, but who could stay mad?

holidays.name: Near Miss Day
holidays.blurb: Share stories about a time something bad almost happened, but fate intervened.

holidays.name: Chocolate Covered Raisins Day
holidays.blurb: Underrated dessert item and movie buddy.

holidays.name: Tolkien Reading Day
holidays.blurb: Hairy feet, dragons and dangerous rings.

holidays.name: Make Up Your Own Holiday Day
holidays.blurb: Be sure to get back to us so we can add it to the list.

holidays.name: Spanish Paella Day
holidays.blurb: The food you wish you were raised on.

holidays.name: Something on a Stick Day
holidays.blurb: Something about food on a stick makes it taste better

holidays.name: Smoke and Mirrors Day
holidays.blurb: Update your social media with your travel pics from Rome you never took.

holidays.name: Take a Walk in the Park Day
holidays.blurb: Have no set destination. Go where the path leads.

holidays.name: Bunsen Burner Day
holidays.blurb: Consider all the breakthrough achievements due to a small blowtorch.

holidays.name: Fun at Work Day
holidays.blurb: Agree on a secret word and yell out when someone accidentally says it.

holidays.name: Peanut Butter and Jelly Day
holidays.blurb: Maybe the best combo on planet Earth.

holidays.name: Party Day
holidays.blurb: You gotta fight for your right to this day.

holidays.name: Walking Day
holidays.blurb: No destination required.

holidays.name: Read a Road Map Day
holidays.blurb: Learn a new part of your city or get lost and map your way found.

holidays.name: First Contact Day
holidays.blurb: Space: the final frontier.

holidays.name: Siamese Cat Day
holidays.blurb: One of the most talkative cats, listen to what they have to say today.

holidays.name: Sorry Charlie Day
holidays.blurb: A day for the unrequited lovers and their broken hearts.

holidays.name: Health Day
holidays.blurb: Get that checkup you've been putting off. Make some new goals to live, work and eat healthier.

holidays.name: Zoo Lovers' Day
holidays.blurb: Visit the local zoo, shelter or sanctuary and appreciate the amazing animal kingdom.

holidays.name: Name Yourself Day
holidays.blurb: On this day, you have a new name other than what your parents gave you. Who knows, maybe it will stick.

holidays.name: Be Kind to Lawyers Day
holidays.blurb: Hate the game, not the lawya.

holidays.name: Siblings Day
holidays.blurb: They drive you nuts, but perhaps no one knows us better.

holidays.name: Pet Day
holidays.blurb: If you don't currently have a pet, a hamster is a good start. If you do, give 'em an extra treat.

holidays.name: Grilled Cheese Day
holidays.blurb: It's just a bread and cheese sandwich, but when grilled it becomes legendary.

holidays.name: Yuri's Night
holidays.blurb: A celebration of the first man in space, Yuri Gagarin. In 1961, he spent 89 minutes in orbit.

holidays.name: Scrabble Day
holidays.blurb: One of the highest scoring words is: sesquioxidizing, meaning to use sesquioxide, a chemical element, on another element

holidays.name: Moment of Laughter Day
holidays.blurb: Charlie Chaplin movies recommended.

holidays.name: Reach as High as You Can Day
holidays.blurb: No goal is too outrageous for this day. Put your dreams in to plans and take action.

holidays.name: Look up at the Sky Day
holidays.blurb: If daytime, avoid looking at the sun. If you observe at night, get out of the city if possible to see all the stars.

holidays.name: Titanic Remembrance Day
holidays.blurb: An eternal lesson about hubris, but also a tragic event for those involved.

holidays.name: Eggs Benedict Day
holidays.blurb: Perfect for breakfast, lunch and dinner.

holidays.name: Haiku Poetry Day
holidays.blurb: Haikus are quite fun. Even if they are tricky. Don't think I did this right.

holidays.name: Velociraptor Awareness Day
holidays.blurb: You can't convince me they wouldn't know how to turn door handles and get me.

holidays.name: High Five Day
holidays.blurb: A proper high five should leave both hands stinging a little bit.

holidays.name: Look Alike Day
holidays.blurb: Convince as many friends as possible to dress alike and then deny it was planned at all.

holidays.name: Record Store Day
holidays.blurb: Visit your local music shop for exclusive records.

holidays.name: Astronomy Day
holidays.blurb: Visit a planetarium or stargaze until you feel as insignificant as possible.

holidays.name: Jelly Bean Day
holidays.blurb: Even the black ones need some love.

holidays.name: Take a Chance Day
holidays.blurb: Ask for a raise!

holidays.name: Book Day
holidays.blurb: There are probably at least ten books in your house you've never read.

holidays.name: Lover's Day
holidays.blurb: Do something special for you significant other.

holidays.name: Pig in a Blanket
holidays.blurb: The hot dog's little (and cuter) brother.

holidays.name: DNA Day
holidays.blurb: Consider the infinite odds which went into making all the life around you.

holidays.name: Poem in Your Pocket Day
holidays.blurb: Select a poem, keep it in your pocket and read it to others you meet today.

holidays.name: Take Our Daughters and Sons to Work Day
holidays.blurb: This can either be a glimpse into your dream job or motivation for the children to work harder at their education.

holidays.name: Pretzel Day
holidays.blurb: Crunchy bread tied in a knot with salt all over it. What's not to like?

holidays.name: Arbor Day
holidays.blurb: Try to plant a tree today to celebrate these givers of shade, fruit and oxygen.

holidays.name: Zipper Day
holidays.blurb: Because who has time for buttons? No excuse to have the fly down today.

holidays.name: Honesty Day
holidays.blurb: Tell them how you really feel about their cooking.

holidays.name: Batman Day
holidays.blurb: He may not have super powers, but he's excellent at naming his possessions.

holidays.name: Brothers and Sisters Day
holidays.blurb: If there are enough of you, start a band.

holidays.name: Paranormal Day
holidays.blurb: Did you hear that?

holidays.name: Space Day
holidays.blurb: Can you hear me Major Tom?

holidays.name: Star Wars Day
holidays.blurb: May the 4th Be with You.

holidays.name: Herb Day
holidays.blurb: Parsley, Sage, Rosemary and Thyme are just a few herbs to use today.

holidays.name: Free Comic Book Day
holidays.blurb: Don't forget to also buy something to support your local comic book shop.

holidays.name: Beverage Day
holidays.blurb: Hot or cold, treat yourself to something indulgent or unusual today.

holidays.name: Tourism Day
holidays.blurb: Does not require travel. There's probably tons of things in your city you haven't done or seen yet.

holidays.name: Teacher's Day
holidays.blurb: Let a teacher know they've made a difference in your life.

holidays.name: Europe Day
holidays.blurb: This is the day to wear a beret, eat unpasteurized cheese, and be a fan of football.

holidays.name: Lost Sock Memorial Day
holidays.blurb: Pay tribute to the noble socks who have been lost forever.

holidays.name: Clean Up Your Room Day
holidays.blurb: If it's overwhelming, start with a small area and see where it leads.

holidays.name: Eat What You Want Day
holidays.blurb: Within reason. Put that cactus down.

holidays.name: Limerick Day
holidays.blurb: There once was a man from Nantucket.

holidays.name: Frog Jumping Day
holidays.blurb: You don't have to be in Calaveras County to observe.

holidays.name: Dance Like a Chicken Day
holidays.blurb: Chicken dance song recommended but not required.

holidays.name: Chocolate Chip Day
holidays.blurb: Improves any cookie.

holidays.name: Wear Purple for Peace Day
holidays.blurb: Start wearing purple.

holidays.name: Tattoo Day
holidays.blurb: Fear of permanent decisions? Try the temporary variety.

holidays.name: Pizza Party Day
holidays.blurb: There's always a reason to throw a pizza party. Today it's a must.

holidays.name: No Dirty Dishes Day
holidays.blurb: An empty, clean sink is the goal today.

holidays.name: May Ray Day
holidays.blurb: Let the sun shine.

holidays.name: Be a Millionaire Day
holidays.blurb: Have the mindset that you are a millionaire. You're just slumming it with us regular folks today.

holidays.name: Waitstaff Day
holidays.blurb: Tip your servers a little extra and leave your table a little neater.

holidays.name: Buy a Musical Instrument Day
holidays.blurb: Anyone can learn a musical instrument and learning to play is a much more rewarding hobby than tv or video games.

holidays.name: Taffy Day
holidays.blurb: Fun to make at home and quite a workout.

holidays.name: Scavenger Hunt Day
holidays.blurb: Learn about geocaching and get out there.

holidays.name: Sing Out Day
holidays.blurb: Don't feel ashamed when singing along in the shower or the car. Today is your day.

holidays.name: Towel Day
holidays.blurb: The most useful possession you could ever own.

holidays.name: Paper Airplane Day
holidays.blurb: Recycle your junk mail.

holidays.name: Sunscreen Day
holidays.blurb: Because sunburn is the worst.

holidays.name: Hamburger Day
holidays.blurb: I'll gladly pay you Tuesday for a hamburger today.

holidays.name: Paper Clip Day
holidays.blurb: The poor man's staple.

holidays.name: Water a Flower Day
holidays.blurb: How does your garden grow?

holidays.name: Web Designer Day
holidays.blurb: We built this.

holidays.name: Say Something Nice Day
holidays.blurb: We'll start it off: You are the most perfect you there is.

holidays.name: Doughnut Day
holidays.blurb: Bring a dozen (or more) to work today.

holidays.name: Leave the Office Early Day
holidays.blurb: Everyone deserves to leave early once and awhile.

holidays.name: Repeat Day
holidays.blurb: I'm going to get the papers. Get the papers.

holidays.name: Cheese Day
holidays.blurb: An endless variety to choose from.

holidays.name: Hug Your Cat Day
holidays.blurb: They may not like it, but it's just once a year.

holidays.name: Yo-yo Day
holidays.blurb: Walk the dog. Rock the Baby.

holidays.name: Running Day
holidays.blurb: Like most things, it gets easier the more times you do it.

holidays.name: Best Friends Day
holidays.blurb: Let your best friend know how much they mean to you.

holidays.name: Knit in Public Day
holidays.blurb: Knit bombing is encouraged today.

holidays.name: Iced Tea Day
holidays.blurb: Sweet tea is the way to go here.

holidays.name: Corn on the Cob Day
holidays.blurb: The perfect corn delivery system includes corn-shaped holders.

holidays.name: Red Rose Day
holidays.blurb: Gift them to the special people in your life.

holidays.name: Sewing Machine Day
holidays.blurb: Honors the invention of the sewing machine which is used on at least 90% of our clothing.

holidays.name: Bourbon Day
holidays.blurb: Good for cooking as well as happy hour.

holidays.name: Nature Photography Day
holidays.blurb: Share your favorite shots of lizards leaping and lions lunging today.

holidays.name: Juggling Day
holidays.blurb: Start with non-breakable items.

holidays.name: Bloomsday
holidays.blurb: Named after the character Leopold Bloom in James Joyce's Ulysses, one of the most important works in literature.

holidays.name: Eat Your Vegetables Day
holidays.blurb: Try to have veggies with each meal. They also make the perfect in-between snack.

holidays.name: Picnic Day
holidays.blurb: Watch out for ants.

holidays.name: Sauntering Day
holidays.blurb: A saunter is a slow, confident walk, change up your stride today.

holidays.name: Daylight Appreciation Day
holidays.blurb: Spend the day outside and celebrate the solstice.

holidays.name: Take Your Dog to Work Day
holidays.blurb: Who doesn't love an office dog. It helps if your dog is well-trained and friendly.

holidays.name: Onion Ring Day
holidays.blurb: The fun way to eat veggies.

holidays.name: Typewriter Day
holidays.blurb: Our modern keyboards owe a lot to the typewriter, but aren't half as mechanically satisfying.

holidays.name: Swim a Lap Day
holidays.blurb: An easy way to get a full body workout in.

holidays.name: Please Take my Children to Work Day
holidays.blurb: The idea is to have someone take your kids off your hands so you can focus on work. Remote workers know what's up.

holidays.name: Chocolate Pudding Day
holidays.blurb: Decadent and endlessly customizable.

holidays.name: Helen Keller Day
holidays.blurb: Birthday of the author, activist and trailblazer.

holidays.name: Fairy Day
holidays.blurb: Fairies bring good luck wherever they go.

holidays.name: Camera Day
holidays.blurb: Take at least one great photo today.

holidays.name: Meteor Watch Day
holidays.blurb: Research when the next meteor shower is taking place or simply stargaze and hope.

holidays.name: Joke Day
holidays.blurb: A man says to his doctor, 'Help! I'm addicted to Twitter!' The doctor says, 'Sorry, I don't follow you...'

holidays.name: I Forgot Day
holidays.blurb: Two tasks today: apologize for things you've forgot and set reminders for next time.

holidays.name: UFO Day
holidays.blurb: The odds are pretty good today will be the day they show up and ask for all our French fries.

holidays.name: Compliment Your Mirror Day
holidays.blurb: Don't go full Narcissus, but find something in the mirror to appreciate.

holidays.name: Plastic Bag Free Day
holidays.blurb: More places are banning these, so might as well make the change now.

holidays.name: Sidewalk Egg Frying Day
holidays.blurb: More of a saying than an actual thing you could do, but there is a contest in Arizona.

holidays.name: Bikini Day
holidays.blurb: Buy a new bikini and get to the beach.

holidays.name: Kissing Day
holidays.blurb: Try out the French greeting Faire la bise (a kiss on the check) today.

holidays.name: Tell the Truth Day
holidays.blurb: Harder than it sounds. No lies allowed today.

holidays.name: Video Games Day
holidays.blurb: Up, Up, Down, Down, Left, Right, Left, Right, B, A

holidays.name: Sugar Cookie Day
holidays.blurb: It's the cookie batter before you add other things, but sometimes that's all you need.

holidays.name: Kitten Day
holidays.blurb: Visit your local animal shelter and give a great home to a kitty in need.

holidays.name: Cheer Up the Lonely Day
holidays.blurb: It's amazing how a friendly greeting can change a person's day.

holidays.name: Simplicity Day
holidays.blurb: Focus on the one or two tasks you must complete today and don't worry about anything else.

holidays.name: Embrace Your Geekness Day
holidays.blurb: 1f u c4n r34d th1s u r34lly 4r3 @ g33k.

holidays.name: Pandemonium Day
holidays.blurb: Some ideas: spontaneous dancing, grocery cart battles, glitter bombs.

holidays.name: Gummi Worm Day
holidays.blurb: Make sure the worms you eat are actually in gummi form.

holidays.name: Snake Day
holidays.blurb: Ssssssssss.

holidays.name: Emoji Day
holidays.blurb: Answer all texts today only with emoji. ðŸ˜€

holidays.name: Hot Dog Day
holidays.blurb: The toppings make the dog.

holidays.name: Stick Out Your Tongue Day
holidays.blurb: Don't get yourself into trouble.

holidays.name: Moon Day
holidays.blurb: Earth's cooler and younger sibling, see if you can spot it during daylight.

holidays.name: Junk Food Day
holidays.blurb: Not a good day for your diet.

holidays.name: Hammock Day
holidays.blurb: If you don't injure youself getting in, hammocks are amazing.

holidays.name: Vanilla Ice Cream Day
holidays.blurb: In a cone, or the perfect complement to just about any kind of pie.

holidays.name: Cousins Day
holidays.blurb: Siblings you don't see as often, let your cousins know how much they mean to you today.

holidays.name: Culinarians Day
holidays.blurb: Try a recipe you've never made before or eat out at the fanciest place you can find.

holidays.name: Uncle and Aunt Day
holidays.blurb: Like parents but cooler.

holidays.name: Take your Pants for a Walk Day
holidays.blurb: Walk to a nearby place you would normally drive.

holidays.name: Milk Chocolate Day
holidays.blurb: Grab that candy bar in the check-out line guilt-free.

holidays.name: Lasagna Day
holidays.blurb: This layered Italian dish which is never not a delight.

holidays.name: Cheesecake Day
holidays.blurb: It's the pie which is also a cake with the word cheese in there. By any name, get yourself a slice of this smooth heaven.

holidays.name: Uncommon Musical Instrument Day
holidays.blurb: Suggestions: glockenspiel, flexatone, keytar.

holidays.name: Girlfriend's Day
holidays.blurb: Let her know how special she is.

holidays.name: Ice Cream Sandwich Day
holidays.blurb: An ice cream sandwich is eaten every 48 seconds. Try to cut that number in half today.

holidays.name: Watermelon Day
holidays.blurb: Watermelon is both a fruit and a vegetable and can relieve muscle soreness.

holidays.name: Beer Day
holidays.blurb: The third most popular drink after water and tea, beer is one of the oldest alcoholic drinks in history. Drink safely and ride home with others.

holidays.name: Single Working Women's Day
holidays.blurb: Take time to appreciate the struggle of the single working woman and help her in any way today.

holidays.name: Sisters' Day
holidays.blurb: Life is better with sisters.

holidays.name: Underwear Day
holidays.blurb: No going commando today. Wear your most comfy undies and maybe treat yourself to something new.

holidays.name: Fresh Breath Day
holidays.blurb: A holiday which seems like it should be every day, try out some new mouthwash.

holidays.name: Lighthouse Day
holidays.blurb: A celebration of lighthouses, beacons, buoys and public piers. Who doesn't love lighthouses?

holidays.name: Happiness Happens Day
holidays.blurb: Find ways to enjoy everything about your day.

holidays.name: Book Lovers Day
holidays.blurb: Travel with the magic of books. Hunt a white whale or go to wizard school.

holidays.name: Lazy Day
holidays.blurb: Neglect any non-essential chores and try to do a little as possible.

holidays.name: Son and Daughter Day
holidays.blurb: Let your sons and daughters know how special they are.

holidays.name: Middle Child Day
holidays.blurb: The middle child is first in our hearts today.

holidays.name: Left-Handers Day
holidays.blurb: 10% of the population struggle with everyday tasks like using scissors and zipping pants.

holidays.name: Creamsicle Day
holidays.blurb: Not just orange, Creamsicles can be found in blue raspberry, lime, grape, cherry and blueberry flavors.

holidays.name: Relaxation Day
holidays.blurb: Put your feet up and rest.

holidays.name: Wave at Security Cameras Day
holidays.blurb: Give security guards something to smile about.

holidays.name: Thrift Shop Day
holidays.blurb: Some of the most amazing items can be found at the local thrift shop for ridiculously low prices.

holidays.name: Fajita Day
holidays.blurb: Let the sizzle of the cast iron be your soundtrack to this day.

holidays.name: Photo Day
holidays.blurb: Make a photo album from your thousands of digital files.

holidays.name: Lemonade Day
holidays.blurb: Invented by the Egyptians, make and enjoy lemonade all day.

holidays.name: Spumoni Day
holidays.blurb: Real spumoni is sliced not scooped.

holidays.name: Be an Angel Day
holidays.blurb: Suggestions: pay for someone else's groceries, give blood, or bring someone a meal who could use it.

holidays.name: Ride Like the Wind Day
holidays.blurb: A tribute to the pioneers of flight. Remember not to take air travel for granted.

holidays.name: Pluto Demoted Day
holidays.blurb: Pluto is still a planet in the galaxy of our hearts.

holidays.name: Kiss and Make up Day
holidays.blurb: The only silver lining when a couple fights is the eventual make-up.

holidays.name: Dog Appreciation Day
holidays.blurb: Man's best friends need their extra treat.

holidays.name: Just Because Day
holidays.blurb: Give logic the day off and do things for no reason at all.

holidays.name: Bow Tie Day
holidays.blurb: The necktie's whimsical and retro cousin, the bow tie adds a little class to any outfit.

holidays.name: More Herbs, Less Salt Day
holidays.blurb: Suggestions: cumin, cayenne, paprika, and oregano.

holidays.name: Frankenstein Day
holidays.blurb: More misunderstood than evil, Frankenstein is the name of the doctor who creates the monster.

holidays.name: Eat Outside Day
holidays.blurb: While you could lay out a full picnic, just taking your lunch and sitting in the grass works too.

holidays.name: Chess Day
holidays.blurb: The number of possible unique chess games is greater than the number of electrons in the universe.

holidays.name: No Rhyme or Reason Day
holidays.blurb: Do things happen for no reason or does it seem that way because we can't yet perecive the reason?

holidays.name: Coconut Day
holidays.blurb: Coconuts have applications in nutrition and skin care to building materials.

holidays.name: Skyscraper Day
holidays.blurb: Take an elevator to the top of the tallest building you can find and admire the view.

holidays.name: Eat an Extra Dessert Day
holidays.blurb: Try one you've never had before or eat out and get a sampler.

holidays.name: Be Late for Something Day
holidays.blurb: Sort of self-explanatory, don't stress out when running late today.

holidays.name: Cheese Pizza Day
holidays.blurb: Cheese, sauce and bread cooked at extreme temperature = magic by the slice.

holidays.name: Fight Procrastination Day
holidays.blurb: Put one foot in front of the other and soon you're walking through the door.

holidays.name: Read a Book Day
holidays.blurb: Recommendation: A Wizard of Earthsea by Ursula K. LeGuin.

holidays.name: Salami Day
holidays.blurb: Perfect complement to wine and cheese

holidays.name: German Language Day

holidays.name: Teddy Bear Day
holidays.blurb: A teddy bear makes anyone feel better.

holidays.name: Swap Ideas Day
holidays.blurb: Can lead to approaches and twists you never would have come up with.

holidays.name: Make Your Bed Day
holidays.blurb: Level up your adulting skills.

holidays.name: Chocolate Milkshake Day
holidays.blurb: The pinnacle of human achievement.

holidays.name: Positive Thinking Day
holidays.blurb: Thought to possibly cure colds and increase life spans.

holidays.name: Roald Dahl Day
holidays.blurb: An author of delightful stories anyone can enjoy.

holidays.name: Coloring Day
holidays.blurb: No one is too old to enjoy coloring.

holidays.name: Clean Up Day
holidays.blurb: It can get worse before it gets better.

holidays.name: Make a Hat Day
holidays.blurb: Straw. Paper. Bowl. Pick your material and put it on your noggin.

holidays.name: Collect Rocks Day

holidays.name: Guacamole Day
holidays.blurb: Invented by the Aztecs, enjoyed by millions.

holidays.name: Respect Day
holidays.blurb: Everyone deserves respect.

holidays.name: Punch Day
holidays.blurb: The kind you drink, please.

holidays.name: Miniature Golf Day

holidays.blurb: Take care of yourself and others

holidays.blurb: Let your guy know he's special.

holidays.blurb: Try to answer a question you've always wondered about.

holidays.blurb: Visit you local sweet shop or learn how to make you favorite childhood dessert.

holidays.name: Wear Something Gaudy Day

holidays.name: Chocolate Cupcake Day
holidays.blurb: Only those allergic to chocolate aren't going to love this day.

holidays.blurb: Meet new friends by volunteering or at a meetup for a hobby you enjoy.

holidays.name: Sweetest Day

holidays.blurb: Visit a pumpkin patch near you.

holidays.name: Internet Day

holidays.blurb: Pull a rabbit out of a hat.

holidays.name: Author's Day
holidays.blurb: Start your autobiography or read someone else's.

holidays.blurb: Adds a little stronk to any song.

holidays.name: Vanilla Cupcake Day

holidays.name: Origami Day
holidays.blurb: Folding paper can lead to some amazing results.

holidays.name: Happy Hour Day
holidays.blurb: It's always happy hour somewhere, but today's it's all day for everyone.

holidays.blurb: Look at this day as practice for what every day should be like. Be kind to someone you normally aren't.

holidays.name: Pickle Day
holidays.blurb: The evil cucumber.

holidays.blurb: That container of cottage cheese isnâ€™t getting any fresher.

holidays.name: Fast Food Day
holidays.blurb: Breakfast is the best kind.

holidays.name: Take A Hike Day
holidays.blurb: Get out of the city and into some nature.

holidays.name: Mickey Mouse Day
holidays.blurb: From Steamboat Willie to Mickey Mouse Clubhouse, try to capture Mickey's carefree spirit.

holidays.name: Men's Day
holidays.blurb: Men: health checkups are ok. Also, try to dress nicer.

holidays.name: Absurdity Day
holidays.blurb: Cars drive on parkways and park on driveways.

holidays.name: Hello Day
holidays.blurb: Hello World.

holidays.blurb: Have a friend with a motorcycle or your own bike? Put some air in those tires and get out there.

holidays.name: Fibonacci Day
holidays.blurb: Sketch out this spiral and try to find examples throughout your day.

holidays.name: Buy Nothing Day
holidays.blurb: It can be quite challenging to spend no money for 24 hours.

holidays.name: Celebrate Your Unique Talent Day
holidays.blurb: Everyone has a special talent of some kind. Today's your day to show it off.

holidays.name: Shopping Reminder Day
holidays.blurb: One month until Christmas!

holidays.name: Cake Day
holidays.blurb: Today, there is cake.

holidays.name: Pins and Needles Day
holidays.blurb: Celebrate clothes makers/menders and seek out the Broadway play.

holidays.name: Red Planet Day

holidays.blurb: Some square dance calls: Do Si Do, Promenade, and Box the Gnat.

holidays.name: Computer Security Day
holidays.blurb: Update or install antivirus software and ignore any fishy emails.

holidays.name: Eat a Red Apple Day

holidays.name: Fritters Day
holidays.blurb: Not just for apples!

holidays.blurb: Handmade = made with love

holidays.name: Wear Brown Shoes Day
holidays.blurb: Good excuse to get a new pair.

holidays.name: Day of the Ninja
holidays.blurb: No one sees this day coming.

holidays.name: Put on Your Own Shoes Day
holidays.blurb: A day to teach the young among us to put their own shoes on.

holidays.name: Microwave Oven Day
holidays.blurb: Hot food for lazy people.

holidays.name: Letter Writing Day
holidays.blurb: Writing a letter in a world of texts and emails just feels more special.

holidays.name: Pretend to Be a Time Traveler Day
holidays.blurb: Scoff at today's technology and marvel at the clothes you see people wearing.

holidays.name: Christmas Card Day
holidays.blurb: If you haven't sent them out yet, make it to the post office today.

holidays.name: Human Rights Day
holidays.blurb: Learn the 7 human rights.

holidays.name: Mountain Day
holidays.blurb: More than half the world's fresh water originates in mountains.

holidays.name: Poinsettia Day
holidays.blurb: One ranch in California grows over 70% of all Poinsettias purchased in the United States

holidays.name: Ice Cream Day
holidays.blurb: As many scoops as you can stack.

holidays.name: Monkey Day
holidays.blurb: Do we like monkeys so much because they remind us of us or because we want to be more like them?

holidays.name: Lemon Cupcake Day
holidays.blurb: You shouldn't make them without real lemon zest.

holidays.name: Chocolate Covered Anything Day
holidays.blurb: You could cover chocolate with more chocolate and be good to go.

holidays.name: Wright Brothers Day
holidays.blurb: Pioneers in flight. Follow in their footsteps by booking an introductory flying course.

holidays.name: Arabic Language Day
holidays.blurb: The origin for tons of English language words such as Algebra, Giraffe, and Orange.

holidays.name: Look for an Evergreen Day

holidays.blurb: Easy to make at home with just six ingredients.

holidays.name: Ugly Sweater Day
holidays.blurb: Are they truly ugly or so ugly they're beautiful?

holidays.blurb: A cookie-based economy is change we can get behind.

holidays.blurb: Be sure to get some bourbon in there.

holidays.blurb: One the easiest pies to make at home.

holidays.blurb: Thank you for using the Everyday Holidays app.

holidays.name: Make Cut-Out Snowflakes Day
holidays.blurb: Make it snow indoors or bring snow to the warmer climates.

holidays.name: Card Playing Day

holidays.name: Pepper Pot Day
holidays.blurb: This signature Philadelphia dish is made up of beef tripe, vegetables, pepper and other seasonings.

holidays.name: Bacon Day
holidays.blurb: Bacon's so good it feels like it should be illegal.

holidays.name: Champagne Day
